description: A 9000 RPM naturally aspirated screamer in a roadster chassis. The S2000's F20C is the highest specific-output naturally aspirated four-cylinder Honda ever built — 120 horsepower per liter without a single forced-induction shortcut. The power lives at the top, and it rewards those brave enough to chase it.
lore: Below 6000 RPM, the S2000 is a pleasant roadster. Above 6000 RPM, VTEC engages and the F20C transforms into something feral. That transition — from polite to unhinged — is what makes the S2000 an addiction you never want to quit.
